python.name: Python
python.description: Python is a programming language that lets you work quickly and integrate systems more effectively.

python-intel.name: Python (Intel)
python-intel.description: Python is a programming language that lets you work quickly and integrate systems more effectively. Optimized for Intel CPUs.

python-tensorflow.name: TensorFlow
python-tensorflow.description: TensorFlow is an end-to-end open source platform for machine learning. It has a comprehensive, flexible ecosystem of tools, libraries and community resources that lets researchers push the state-of-the-art in ML and developers easily build and deploy ML powered applications.

python-pytorch.name: PyTorch
python-pytorch.description: PyTorch is an open source machine learning framework that accelerates the path from research prototyping to production deployment.

python-chainer.name: Chainer
python-chainer.description: Chainer is a powerful, flexible and intuitive deep learning framework.

julia-tensorflow.name: TensorFlow (Julia)
julia-tensorflow.description: This is Julia-integrated TensorFlow environment. TensorFlow is an end-to-end open source platform for machine learning. It has a comprehensive, flexible ecosystem of tools, libraries and community resources that lets researchers push the state-of-the-art in ML and developers easily build and deploy ML powered applications.

ngc-digits.name: DIGITS (NGC)
ngc-digits.description: This environment is integrated with Nvidia GPU Cloud.

ngc-tensorflow.name: TensorFlow (NGC)
ngc-tensorflow.description: TensorFlow is an end-to-end open source platform for machine learning. It has a comprehensive, flexible ecosystem of tools, libraries and community resources that lets researchers push the state-of-the-art in ML and developers easily build and deploy ML powered applications. This environment is integrated with Nvidia GPU Cloud.

ngc-pytorch.name: PyTorch (NGC)
ngc-pytorch.description: PyTorch is an open source machine learning framework that accelerates the path from research prototyping to production deployment. This environment is integrated with Nvidia GPU Cloud.

ngc-caffe2.name: Caffe 2 (NGC)
ngc-caffe2.description: Caffe2 is a deep learning framework that provides an easy and straightforward way for you to experiment with deep learning and leverage community contributions of new models and algorithms. This environment is integrated with Nvidia GPU Cloud.

ngc-caffe3.name: Caffe 3 (NGC)
ngc-caffe3.description: This environment is integrated with Nvidia GPU Cloud.

ngc-nvcaffe.name: NVCaffe (NGC)
ngc-nvcaffe.description: Caffe is a deep-learning framework made with flexibility, speed, and modularity in mind. NVCaffe is an NVIDIA-maintained fork of BVLC Caffe tuned for NVIDIA GPUs, particularly in multi-GPU configurations. This environment is integrated with Nvidia GPU Cloud.

ngc-matlab.name: MATLAB (NGC)
ngc-matlab.description: MATLAB® combines a desktop environment tuned for iterative analysis and design processes with a programming language that expresses matrix and array mathematics directly. This environment is integrated with Nvidia GPU Cloud.

matlab.name: MATLAB
matlab.description: MATLAB® combines a desktop environment tuned for iterative analysis and design processes with a programming language that expresses matrix and array mathematics directly.

intel-tensorflow.name: TensorFlow (Intel MKL)
intel-tensorflow.description: TensorFlow is an end-to-end open source platform for machine learning. It has a comprehensive, flexible ecosystem of tools, libraries and community resources that lets researchers push the state-of-the-art in ML and developers easily build and deploy ML powered applications. This environment is optimized with Intel MKL.

intel-python.name: Python (Intel MKL)
intel-python.description: Python is a programming language that lets you work quickly and integrate systems more effectively. This environment is optimized with Intel MKL.

lablup-pytorch.name: PyTorch (Cloudia)
lablup-pytorch.description: PyTorch is an open source machine learning framework that accelerates the path from research prototyping to production deployment. This environment is fully integrated with Cloudia platform.
